articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Queensland votes to legalize abortion
articles.description: Abortion will be legalized in Queensland, after lawmakers in the Australian state overturned 19th-century legislation banning the procedure.

articles.title: Welch's says grape juice is for men now​
articles.description: Welch's Grape Juice sales were down, then they saw a new marketing opportunity: men in their 40s. These ads are the result.

articles.author: Oliver Darcy, CNN Business
articles.title: Secret Service reviewing incident of agent blocking reporter from questioning Kushner
articles.description: The US Secret Service said it is reviewing an incident in which an agent blocked a CBS News reporter on Tuesday from questioning Jared Kushner about the disappearance of Jamal Khashoggi.

articles.title: هل تساءلت يوماً عما يتضمنه لحم الوجبات السريعة الذي تتناوله؟
articles.description: تقوم 6 مجموعات ناشطة خاصة بالمستهلك بتحذير الأشخاص حول خطورة استخدام المضادات الحيوية في اللحم الذي يقدم في أكبر 25 مطعماً لشطائر البرغر بالولايات المتحدة، لكن لماذا عليك الاهتمام بهذا الأمر؟

articles.author: Sheena Jones and Jason Hanna, CNN
articles.title: Priest accused of child sexual abuse in grand jury report pleads guilty to felony charges
articles.description: One of the priests accused in a Pennsylvania grand jury report of sexually abusing children pleaded guilty Wednesday to two felonies, the state attorney general's office said.

articles.title: Netflix has plenty of room left to grow
articles.description: More and more Netflix customers are coming from overseas — a sign that there's plenty of room for the streaming company to get even bigger than it already is.

articles.title: Fed appears committed to gradual tightening despite Trump criticism
articles.description: President Donald Trump's repeated complaints about rising interest rates appear to be having no impact on policy so far.

articles.author: Hilary Clarke, CNN
articles.title: EU leaders say leave us to our beer
articles.description: European leaders took a break from Brexit talks Wednesday evening to enjoy a beer and a plate of French fries together in Brussels' opulent Grande Place, CNN affiliate N1 reported.

articles.author: Jack Guy and Euan McKirdy, CNN
articles.title: Meghan and Harry talk baby names on Melbourne tram
articles.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex continued their Australian jaunt with a visit to Melbourne, a ride on one of the city's famous trams and a very brief chat about baby names.
